title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS.
content:
# Portfolio Website

This is **my** portfolio site! It’s built with:

- React & Tailwind CSS
- A Django + Hasura backend
- An interactive LLM‑driven chat bot

Learn more by exploring the code on [GitHub](https://github.com/your-username/portfolio).

title: E-Commerce Store
description: Full-stack store with Django REST API and React frontend.
content:
## Features

1. Product catalog with filters  
2. Shopping cart & checkout  
3. Admin dashboard  

> Built using Django REST Framework and React.
